original_text: And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.
korean_text: 잇사갈 자손 중에서 시세를 알고 이스라엘이 마땅히 행할 것을 아는 우두머리가 이백 명이니 그들은 그 모든 형제를 통솔하는 자이며

sentences.original_text: And of the children of Issachar
which were men that had understanding of the times
to know what Israel ought to do
the heads of them were two hundred
and all their brethren were at their commandment
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 모든 형제들은 그들의 명령을 따랐다
